caption.center: THE STATE OF WASHINGTON, Respondent, v. TIMOTHY EARL PUGH, Appellant.

court.center: The Court of Appeals of Washington, Division One.

posture.unpublished: [EDITOR'S NOTE: This case is unpublished as indicated by the issuing court.] Appeal from the Superior Court for King County, No. 96-1-06843-4, Steven G. Scott, J., entered March 25, 1997.

opinion_text.unpublished: Affirmed by unpublished opinion per Grosse, J., concurred in by Coleman and Becker, JJ.
